snippet: The government sees bright spots in China's economy, like employment, high-tech industries and services, said Vice Premier Zhang Gaoli.
lead_paragraph: The government sees bright spots in China's economy, like employment, high-tech industries and services, said Vice Premier Zhang Gaoli.

headline.main: Slowdown in China Is Stabilizing, Official Says
headline.print_headline: Slowdown in China Is Stabilizing, Official Says
